Name: DataPath
Description: The path with the data to replace

Name: ReplacedChars
Description: A string with all characters that will be replaced. All occurrences of each character will be replaced

Name: ReplacingChars
Description: A string with all characters that will be replace the first ones, respectivelly

Name: Recursive
Description: Resolve the value mustaches until exist a mustache inside it

Name: Resolve
Description: Resolve the value mustaches or functions
